role_description: An Ansible role that installs git-extras (a popular set of git extensions) on almost any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Git Extras](https://github.com/tj/git-extras) includes extra git utilities that include repo summary, repl, changelog population, author commit percentages, and more.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs git-extras (a popular set of git extensions) on almost any platform.
